response.answer_text: There are many ways to make money with relationship blog1)Google Adsense you can make a lot of money by adding google adsense to your website google will pay you amount of money for each clich generated to their ads from your website,also they will pay you per impressions(amount of people who see your ads).2)Selling spot on your websiteyou can sale a space on your website for other people to put their ads ie people they put their ads on your website and you charge them per day,week or month basis you can charge from $5 to few hundreds $ depending of the size of the ad and the popularity of your site.3)You can sell affiliate products from your website these can vary for CPA offer(cost per action=you get paid when a visitor do a certain action eg submitt email or zip code ) to revenue share offers(you get paid a percentage of the sale=when a visitor buy a product you get paid).just google relationship affiliate programs you will find a lot of products to promote to your visitors.These three for me are the best ways to make money from your blog

If you mean a blog that discusses the topic of relationships I would suggest as a popular topic area the blog could focus on articles and stories about people's experiences and learnings and then open up the comments area to debate. You could improve this dialogue by linking each article to a forum area. The more people who read and want to agree their own views and experiences, the larger the audience will grow as content will build. People love to share their views and experiences.  The commitment of regular and frequent articles will result in a growing and returning audience. Advertising and sponsorships would start to bring in earnings.   You could then consider other revenue opportunities such Ebooks and product sales.  But first you need that large audience :-)

You can run ads, not only for sponsors (like dating sites, restaurants, romantic travel locations, etc.), but also affiliate offers for things to do like Groupons, Entertainment coupon books, Google adsense and more.  Earning income through sponsored posts is a possibility. You may be able to negotiate  projects directly with brands or there are also blogging networks that regularly offer blogging opportunities that you can apply for.  I would also sign up to be an Amazon affiliate and write your own "sponsored" posts linking to a few things on Amazon through your affiliate link in popular articles.  If you write an article about romantic date night tips, you could link to candles, etc.  There are also other ways related to your blog to monetize utilizing your social media following including paid tweets, paid Facebook posts and more.  Good luck!
